comments:
Integration build Oct 08 2003 
-create a java project
-disable all roles (Help > Role configuration)
-try to open the .classpath file from the project created in part 1

The following NPE occurs.

The problem here appears to be that we are not handling the null case for 
getDefaultEditor().

some more info from the .log

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Oct 08, 2003 11:30:55.248

Looks like a failure to load the memento for the file as well.

We have been unable to replicate. Moving to Kim - please close if it is not 
useful.

I can't reproduce either.  I suspect that the changes Tod and I made to some of
the editor manager stuff for roles may have played a part in it, though.  This
problem was likely addressed by the fix for Bug 44352.
